description:
The student council is the same as always. Suzu loses her appetite during lunch, and starts to feel ill. Uomi, the Eiryou student council president, comes to Ousai Academy. She`s impressed by the wonderful arrangement of flowers that decorates the student council room.  Ousai Academy has been hit with an onslaught of hay fever. It`s possible the hay fever is causing some bathroom incidents...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hagimura Suzu o Mimamotteimashita / Ousai-Eiryou Gakuen Kouryuukai Okawari! / Shoujou Check Joubi wa Poke Tissue
Watching Over Suzu Hagimura / Ousai-Eiryou School Mixer Strikes Back! / Doctor Exam, Have Your Tissues Ready
萩村スズを見守っていました / 桜才・英稜学園交流会おかわり! / 症状チェック常備はポケティッシュ
